name: Minecraft Noob vs Zombies 3
description:
Noob vs. Zombies 3 is a walkthrough game with many adventures.                                 Players must collect resources, hunt, craft weapons, fight zombies and explore the world to survive and collect all the figurines.                                 

Hunt and fight zombie bosses and find figurines in this free walkthrough game.                                 

"Noob vs. Zombies" is not an official Mojang app. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang and is not affiliated with Noob vs. Zombies
